# Variables Docs

## Object Variable Assignment

- [Object Variable Assignment](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/language-features/variables/object-variable-assignment.md): Learn more about: Object Variable Assignment (Visual Basic)
- [How to: Declare an Object Variable and Assign an Object to It](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/language-features/variables/how-to-declare-an-object-variable-and-assign-an-object-to-it.md): Learn more about: How to: Declare an Object Variable and Assign an Object to It in Visual Basic
- [How to: Make an Object Variable Not Refer to Any Instance](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/language-features/variables/how-to-make-an-object-variable-not-refer-to-any-instance.md): Learn more about: How to: Make an Object Variable Not Refer to Any Instance (Visual Basic)
